error.rate_limited: Currently rate limited, please try again later.

upgrade_needed.description: As part of [ClimaCell's rebranding to Tomorrow.io](https://www.tomorrow.io/blog/my-last-day-as-ceo-of-climacell/) we will migrate your existing ClimaCell config entry to the new Tomorrow.io integration after you finish this config flow. Unfortunately, **the V3 API is now deprecated** and you will need to get a new V4 API key from [Tomorrow.io](https://app.tomorrow.io/development/keys) before we can complete the migration. Once you have obtained a new API key, enter it on the next screen and hit submit so it can be verified. Your old ClimaCell config entry will then be automatically removed and replaced by a Tomorrow.io one.

user.description: To get an API key, sign up at [Tomorrow.io](https://app.tomorrow.io/signup).

init.description: If you choose to enable the `nowcast` forecast entity, you can configure the number of minutes between each forecast. The number of forecasts provided depends on the number of minutes chosen between forecasts.
init.title: Update Tomorrow.io Options
